products.name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: Experience premium sound quality with these wireless over-ear headphones. Features active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and comfortable ear cushions for extended listening sessions.

products.name: Smart Watch Series 5
products.description: Stay connected and track your fitness with this advanced smartwatch. Features heart rate monitoring, GPS, water resistance up to 50 meters, and a beautiful retina display.

products.name: Ultra HD Smart TV 55"
products.description: Transform your home entertainment with this 55-inch Ultra HD Smart TV. Featuring crystal-clear 4K resolution, smart capabilities for streaming your favorite content, and multiple HDMI ports for all your devices.

products.name: Men's Casual T-Shirt
products.description: Classic comfort meets modern style with this premium cotton t-shirt. Features a relaxed fit, durable fabric that gets softer with each wash, and is available in multiple colors.

products.name: Women's Running Shoes
products.description: Engineered for performance and comfort, these running shoes feature responsive cushioning, breathable mesh upper, and durable rubber outsoles that provide excellent traction on various surfaces.

products.name: Denim Jeans
products.description: Classic denim jeans with a modern fit. Made from high-quality denim that offers both comfort and durability, these jeans are perfect for casual everyday wear.

products.name: Stainless Steel Cooker
products.description: Durable and easy to use, this stainless steel cooker ensures fast, even cooking with added safety features. Compatible with all stovetops and easy to cleanâ€”perfect for everyday meals.

products.name: Robot Vacuum Cleaner
products.description: Let this smart robot vacuum do the cleaning for you. Features intelligent mapping, powerful suction, and can be controlled via smartphone app. Set schedules and cleaning patterns for a consistently clean home.

products.name: Bedding Set - Queen
products.description: Transform your bedroom with this luxury bedding set. Includes a duvet cover, fitted sheet, flat sheet, and 4 pillowcases. Made from 100% Egyptian cotton with a 400 thread count for exceptional softness and durability.

products.name: Wireless Charging Pad
products.description: Charge your compatible devices wirelessly with this sleek charging pad. Features fast charging technology, LED indicator, and non-slip surface to keep your device secure while charging.

products.name: Winter Jacket
products.description: Stay warm during the coldest months with this insulated winter jacket. Features a waterproof outer shell, thermal lining, adjustable hood, and multiple pockets for all your essentials.

products.name: Coffee Maker
products.description: Start your morning right with this programmable coffee maker. Features a 12-cup capacity, built-in grinder for fresh coffee, and timer function so you can wake up to freshly brewed coffee every day.
